snippet: The professor, Elizabeth Snyder, said her actions were misinterpreted and she became “the victim of a character assassination” after reports that she tried to silence a stuttering student.
lead_paragraph: The professor, Elizabeth Snyder, said her actions were misinterpreted and she became “the victim of a character assassination” after reports that she tried to silence a stuttering student.

headline.print_headline: After Public Outrage, Professor Says Handling of Stuttering Student Was Misinterpreted
headline.seo: Professor of Philip Garber, N.J. Stutterer, Defends Actions
